This Campus Moviefest award-winner revisits the fascinating story of Fanya Kaplan, a zealous socialist revolutionary, and her attempted assassination of Vladimir Lenin Directed by: Brad Tucker ; Michael Gluzman, Screenplay: Wesley Wingo,  Cinematography: Alan Melling, Original Score: Rolan Duvvury, Editing:  Matt Bigelow ;
